snippet.title: Dune (1992) PC 1st-person Sci-fi Adventure
snippet.description:
╔═════════ஜ۩☢۩ஜ═════════╗
►║|   *OPEN ME FOR MORE INFOS*   |║◄
╚═════════ஜ۩☢۩ஜ═════════╝

On this channel you will find tons of first person games as an archive for ALL first person games ever published is created here. The videos show you the first 15-30 minutes of gameplay without any comment, as I don't want to influence anyone with my opinion. If you like a game, I almost always have links in the info box where you can get the game (legal) without much searching. If you like the channel, you are welcome to leave me a subscription. THX

Dune (1992) PC 1st-person Sci-fi Adventure

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

*►Info:◄*

https://www.mobygames.com/game/380/dune/

https://ogdb.eu/index.php?section=title&titleid=2143

https://www.igdb.com/games/dune

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

*►Engine:◄*

???

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

*►Other First Person Games from the developers "Cryo Interactive":◄*

Dune (1992)
https://youtu.be/0ZLXJIbQ3qw 🇺🇸 
https://youtu.be/3nD8WC86gsg 🇩🇪 

Dragon Lore: The Legend Begins (1994)
https://youtu.be/Xi1Cq4_XMe4 🇩🇪 

Lost Eden (1995)
https://youtu.be/dqipk1nyY9Y 🇺🇸 
https://youtu.be/XdqVWdO6Ky0 🇩🇪 

Versailles 1685 (1996)
https://youtu.be/9_BQQxAA2aY 🇩🇪 

Hardline (1996)
https://youtu.be/I4bC17vU2EA 🇩🇪 

Dragon Lore 2 - The Heart of the Dragon Man (1996)
https://youtu.be/-JKYKBqmY3g 🇩🇪

Treasure Hunter (1997)
https://youtu.be/1oUdGX0yW3I

Egypt 1156 B.C. - Tomb of the Pharaoh (1997)
https://youtu.be/5Fnlhk_3x1A 🇺🇸 
https://youtu.be/3OK8Td0Kb5I 🇩🇪 

Atlantis: Das sagenhafte Abenteuer (1997)
https://youtu.be/uDLx_ItF3-o 🇩🇪

Zero Zone (1998)
https://youtu.be/gr_x9lSo-5E

Les Visiteurs - Le Jeu (1998)
https://youtu.be/muKewAs24RE 

China: The Forbidden City (1998)
https://youtu.be/azzYQwNUYpk 🇺🇸 
https://youtu.be/hiwDQGds1ow 🇩🇪 

Atlantis 2 - Beyond Atlantis (1999)
https://youtu.be/DokYmg6vgAE 🇺🇸 
https://youtu.be/e_p82t7w5e8 🇩🇪 

The Sacred Amulet (1999)
https://youtu.be/_cssanJOpYg 🇺🇸 
https://youtu.be/2gtSAJ-n0jo 🇩🇪 

Egypt 2 - The Heliopolis Prophecy (2000)
https://youtu.be/PUbwJZhAIhA 🇺🇸 
https://youtu.be/4txxdfMTP78 🇩🇪

Beyond Atlantis 2 - New Worlds Await You... (2001)
https://youtu.be/VxPE3kWI9lo 🇺🇸
https://youtu.be/1geNYWd9vJ8 🇩🇪 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

*►The Hall:◄* --- German/Deutsch

https://www.youtube.com/@FPS.Games.Archiv/playlists?view=50&sort=dd&shelf_id=4

*►The Hall:◄* --- English

https://www.youtube.com/@FPS.Games.Archiv/playlists?view=50&sort=dd&shelf_id=3

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

*►Long version:◄*
https://youtu.be/0ZLXJIbQ3qw

*►Short version:◄*
https://youtu.be/QWgNz1SHHWw

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

*►Gameplay:◄*

00:00 - Intro
00:03 - Intro & Main
02:35 - Gameplay - Check the info box for further details

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

*►You can get the game here:◄*

eBay Germany (Affiliate link):
https://ebay.us/tC3OVr

eBay U.S. (Affiliate link):
https://ebay.us/3upLZ8

Affiliate links: If you buy something through these links, I get a small commission without the price changing for you. This way you can support this channel if you want

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

*►Hall Support:◄*

My Channel Supporter:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCg15o2O5-_TmS2RrQL8a1dw/join
